question: Your next door neighbour owns a small dog that barks throughout the day and the night. Write a letter to your neighbour requesting that something be done about the dog. Include in your letter:• Your reason for writing• What you would like to happen• A nice, respectful style
text: Hope this letter finds you in  good spirits and health. I am writing to bring you a notice of the inconvenience caused because of the barking of your puppy.

I am a final year student of British Colombia University. I am pursuing a post-graduate course in mathematics. The course material is very tough and difficult to understand. I have to spend many hours on examination and need to go through some practical problems. Unfortunately, due to baking your puppy throughout the day and night, I am not able to concentrate on my studies. Moreover, I am not able to take sound sleep at night.
I hope this letter will not offend you as I am just trying to explain my difficulties and concerns about my studies.
I recommend you to take immediate action on this or if you want, we can jointly discuss to resolve it. I am looking forward to your positive response and support
